HEMAscRaper 2.0.0

  • Changelog

    HEMA Fights Dataset

    hema_fights.Rd

    This dataset contains information about individual HEMA fights, including the fighters involved, their performance metrics, and match outcomes.

    hema_fights

    Format

    A data frame with the following columns:

    match_id

    Integer. Unique identifier for each match.

    event_id

    Integer. Identifier for the event in which the match took place.

    event_name

    Character. Name of the event.

    event_date

    Date. Date of the event.

    fighter_1

    Character. Name of the first fighter.

    fighter_1_result

    Character. Result of the match for the first fighter (e.g., "Win", "Loss").

    fighter_2

    Character. Name of the second fighter.

    fighter_2_result

    Character. Result of the match for the second fighter.

    fighter_id

    Integer. Identifier for the primary fighter associated with the match record.

    opponent_id

    Integer. Identifier for the opponent fighter.

    stage

    Character. Stage of the tournament.

    tournament_category

    Character. Category of the tournament.

    tournament_id

    Integer. Identifier for the tournament.

    tournament_name

    Character. Name of the tournament.

    tournament_note

    Character. Additional notes regarding the tournament.

    tournament_weapon

    Character. Weapon category used in the tournament.

    elo_1

    Numeric. Elo rating of fighter 1.

    elo_2

    Numeric. Elo rating of fighter 2.

    update_1

    Numeric. Updated metric 1 (please adjust the description as needed).

    update_2

    Numeric. Updated metric 2 (please adjust the description as needed).

    win_chance_1

    Numeric. Win chance for fighter 1 (expressed as a proportion or percentage).

    win_chance_2

    Numeric. Win chance for fighter 2 (expressed as a proportion or percentage).

    Examples

    data(hema_fights)
head(hema_fights)
#> # A tibble: 6 × 22
#>   match_id tournament_id event_id event_date event_name     tournament_name

#> 3        3           121       43 2011-11-04 Swordfish 2011 Mixed Steel Longswo…
#> 4        4           121       43 2011-11-04 Swordfish 2011 Mixed Steel Longswo…
#> 5        5           121       43 2011-11-04 Swordfish 2011 Mixed Steel Longswo…
#> 6        6           121       43 2011-11-04 Swordfish 2011 Mixed Steel Longswo…

#> #   elo_2 <dbl>
